text: The National Public Health Emergency Team (NPHET) is a group within Ireland's Department of Health. It is in the power of the Minister for Health to create such a group as the need arises, i.e. during a public health emergency. ==History== ===2019=== The government website contains minutes from NPHET meetings in 2019. That NPHET dealt with CPE. ===2020=== According to The Irish Times, a NPHET to deal with the emerging SARS-CoV-2 was created on 27 January 2020. ==References==
title: National Public Health Emergency Team
